column4: dl551  broadcom have been doing a experiemental open source driver for some cards recently
I saw that. IMHO I think its "a bit too late"
I can attest that we have actually used ubuntu desktop edition to run as a server for some of our applications, and it works great. Just some food for thought to add on the table.
definitely. I'm just saying. even desktop edition can offer a world of use. :P
